name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ESUIT | Translation for Meta Business Suite™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your global communication; supports Meta Business Suite, Facebook, Messenger and Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Enhance your global communication effortlessly with our innovative browser translation extension—Translation for Meta Business Suite™.

Uniquely crafted for chat translation, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ seamlessly integrates with Meta Business Suite, Facebook, Messenger, and Instagram, allowing you to break language barriers directly within your conversations.

Featuring a multi-engine translation technology, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ offers the choice between leading services such as Google Translate, Volcengine, ChatGPT, and Gemini, giving you the flexibility to select the translation quality that suits your needs. 

With a rich array of configuration options, tailoring your translation experience has never been easier. Whether you're engaging in business dialogues, customer support, or social chats, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ is your go-to solution for real-time, accurate, and context-aware language translation.

Support platforms
1. Meta Business Suite
2. Facebook
3. Messenger
4. Instagram

Support translation engines
1. Google translate
2. Volcengine
3. ChatGPT
4. Gemini


Warning
Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This is an independent project developed by ESUIT. and has no relationship to Facebook™ or Facebook Inc. 

this extension is not officially developed by Facebook™, The author is @William Chen

Got feedback or experiencing any issues? Let us know on Facebook! Your input is important to us and we're here to help.
https://www.facebook.com/esuitdev

Enhance your global communication effortlessly with our innovative browser translation extension—Translation for Meta Business Suite™.

Uniquely crafted for chat translation, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ seamlessly integrates with Meta Business Suite, Facebook, Messenger, and Instagram, allowing you to break language barriers directly within your conversations.

Featuring a multi-engine translation technology, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ offers the choice between leading services such as Google Translate, Volcengine, ChatGPT, and Gemini, giving you the flexibility to select the translation quality that suits your needs. 

With a rich array of configuration options, tailoring your translation experience has never been easier. Whether you're engaging in business dialogues, customer support, or social chats, Translation for Meta Business Suite™ is your go-to solution for real-time, accurate, and context-aware language translation.

If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. (We only collect this data from subscribers; if you do not subscribe, we will not collect any of your data.) This is our privacy policy.
https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

Notice: this extension has In-App Purchases.
This extension includes features that require payment to unlock unlimited usage. Please refer to our pricing page for more details.
https://esuit.dev/pricing/translation-for-meta-business-suite
